name: iQra
0:
”Alexa, ask iqra read for an ayah”
”Alexa, ask iqra read for a random ayah”
”Alexa, ask iqra read for any ayah”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: iqra read
des:
Iqra can give you a random ayah with translation and recitation. 

It has been designed with memorization in mind with the correct Tajweed (Currently only Abdul Basit 'Abd us-Samad [Mujjawad]). 

You can ask iqra to keep repeating the ayah or continue to next ayah. You can also ask it to give a random verse from the Qur'an with the Saheeh international translation.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
